trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto compatível com o padrão de controle; se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />, esse método retorna um objeto compatível com o padrão de controle; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is read-only
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> é somente leitura

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que é associada a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> não está habilitada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco do teclado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> did not get focus.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> não recebeu foco.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: O valor para o qual definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que está associada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> não está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Obtém a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> propriedade o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> que está associado este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
